title: Create an Ethical Wall
description: A firm takes on a new matter that is adverse to a former client. To avoid a conflict, the firm needs to create an 'ethical wall' to screen off the attorneys who worked on the former matter.

tasks.description: Identify the attorneys and staff who worked on the previous, conflicting matter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of individuals to be screened.

tasks.description: Restrict those individuals' access to the new matter in the document and case management systems.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates system permissions to create the electronic wall.

tasks.description: Draft and circulate a memo to all firm personnel notifying them of the ethical wall and the requirement not to discuss the new matter with the screened individuals.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent formally communicates the ethical wall requirements to the entire firm.
